properties.name: app.name
properties.description: The name of the application, it is recommended to be same as the artifactId: @artifactId@

properties.name: app.root
properties.description: The root path of the application. i.e. C:/IST/my-app

properties.name: app.logs
properties.description: The path of the logs directory. i.e. C:/IST/my-app/logs
